description: Katsav, Moshe, 1945- -- Photographs; Rabin, Yitzhak, 1922-1995 -- Photographs
label: The winter session of the Knesset opened today with a report by Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin on the security situation following the killing of the five soldiers in Lebanon and the killing of the soldier in Hebron.
